article_node.title: Israel declares Gaza’s largest city a combat zone as death toll surpasses 63,000
article_node.summary: Israel has declared Gaza City a combat zone and resumed daytime fighting after weeks of preparatory strikes, raising the Gaza death toll to 63,025 and prompting widespread evacuation of residents. The Israeli army recovered the remains of two hostages, while Hamas claims its fighters remain ready and hostages are still held. International aid groups and the UN have condemned the offensive, citing severe humanitarian impacts, including famine and limited medical capacity, as the conflict escalates.
